resources.string: Apăsați butonul pentru a afișa notița originală
Nu există conturi pentru a fi afișate
Nici o notiță programtă pentru a afișa!
Scrie o notiță și apoi alege Planifică din meniul de sus.
Data planificării trebuie să fie mai mare decât ora curentă!
Economizor de baterie este activat! Acesta ar putea să nu funcţioneze conform aşteptărilor.
The time for muting should be greater than one minute.
%1$s has been muted until %2$s.\n You can unmute this account from their profile page.
%1$s is muted until %2$s.\n Tap here to unmute the account.
Unable to connect to instance domain!
Contul a fost trecut pe modul silențios!
Contul nu mai este pe modul silențios!

Notița a fost înlăturată de la favorite!
A apărut o eroare! Instanța nu a returnat un cod de autorizare!
Domeniul de instanță nu pare să fie valid!
A apărut o eroare în timp ce schimbați între conturi!
S-a produs o eroare în timpul căutării!
Datele de profil au fost salvate!
Nu se poate efectua nici o acțiune
S-a produs o eroare în timpul traducerii!
Ești sigur că această instanță permite acest număr de caractere? De obicei, această valoare este aproape de 500 de caractere.
S-a modificat vizibilitatea notițelor pentru contul %1$s
Adauga URL-ul de media în notițe
Notifică atunci când cineva vă urmărește
Notifica atunci când cineva amplifică statusul
Notifica atunci când cineva favorizează statusul tău
Notifică atunci când cineva vă menţionează
Arată caseta de confirmare înainte de amplificare
Arată caseta de confirmare înainte de a adăuga la favorite
NSFW Vezi timp expirare (secunde, 0 înseamnă oprit)
Automatically split toots in replies when chars are over:
Data trebuie să fie mai mare decât %1$s
Data trebuie să fie mai mică decât %1$s
Your API key, you can leave blank for Yandex
First letter in capital for replies
Vă rugăm să confirmați notificările instant pe care doriți să le primiți Puteți să activați sau dezactivați aceste setări, mai târziu (Fereastra de notificații).
Sunt %1$s din date în memoria cache. \n\nVreți să le ștergeți?
Memoria cache a fost golită! %1$s au fost eliberate
No toots were found in database. Please, use the synchronize button from the menu to retrieve them.

Doar infomațiile de bază ale conturilor sunt stocate pe aparat. Aceste date sunt strict confidențiale și pot fi folosite doar de aplicație. Ștergerea aplicației duce la pierderea datelor.\n ⚠ Autentificarea și parolele nu sunt niciodate stocate. Sunt folosite doar într-o autentificare sigură (SSL).

- ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: Folosit la detectarea daca aparatul este conectat la o rețea de WIFI.
 - INTERNET: Folosit pentru intergogări la o instanță.
 - WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Folosit pentru a stoca media sau pentru a muta aplicația pe un card SD.
 - READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Folosit să adauge media la notițe.
 - BOOT_COMPLETED: Folosit la pornirea serviciului de notificare.
 - WAKE_LOCK: Folosit în timpul serviciului de notificare.

- Citește: Citește date.
 - Scrie: Postează statusuri și încarcă media pentru statusuri.
 - Urmărește: Urmărește, nu mai urmări, blochează, deblochează.

 ⚠ Aceste acțiuni s efectuează doar la cererea utilizatorului.

The application does not use tracking tools (audience measurement, error reporting, etc.) and does not contain any advertising.

 The use of libraries is minimized: 
 - Glide: To manage media
 - Android-Job: To manage services
 - PhotoView: To manage images

Alpicația oferă posibilitatea de a traduce notițe folosind local-ul aparatului și API-ul Yandex.\n Yandex are propria politică de confidențialitate care poate fi găsită aici: https://yandex.ru/legal/confidential/?lang=en
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this list?
There is nothing in this list yet. When members of this list post new statuses, they will appear here.
The account was added to the list!
You don\'t have any lists yet!

Here are some checks that might help:

 - Check there is no spelling mistakes in the instance name

 - Check that your instance is not down

 - If you use the two-factor authentication (2FA), please use the link at the bottom (once the instance name is filled)

 - You can also use this link without using the 2FA

 - If it still does not work, please raise an issue on FramaGit at https://framagit.org/tom79/fedilab/issues
Media has been loaded. Tap here to display it.
This action can be quite long. You will be notified when it will be finished.
%1$s toots out of %2$s have been exported.
Something went wrong when exporting data for %1$s

Something went wrong when importing data!

The account is no longer featured on profile
No filters to display. You can create one by tapping on the \"+\" button.
Will be matched regardless of casing in text or content warning of a toot
Filtered toots will disappear irreversibly, even if filter is later removed
When the keyword or phrase is alphanumeric only, it will only be applied if it matches the whole word
One or multiple contexts where the filter should apply
There is no accounts listed for the moment!
Accounts were added to the list
You have not created a list yet. Tap on the \"+\" button to add a new one.
Are you sure to block %s?\n\nYou will not see any content from that domain in any public timeline or in your notifications. Your followers from that domain will be removed.

The video has been removed from bookmarks!

Truncate toots over \'x\' lines. Zero means disabled.
Open the menu of a toot and then choose Schedule boost.
Add description for media (for the visually impaired)

In this field, you need to write your instance host name.
For example, if you created your account on https://mastodon.social
Just write mastodon.social (without https://)
 You can start writing first letters and names will be suggested.

 ⚠ The Login button will only work if the instance name is valid and the instance is up!
No app supporting this link is installed on your device.
Are you sure to delete this comment?
This video contains mature or explicit content
Tap here to edit the video data.

Display new toots above the \"Fetch more\" button

There is no Internet connection. Your message has been stored in drafts.
Open Collective enables groups to quickly set up a collective, raise funds and manage them transparently.

http calls blocked by the application
The data base has been exported!
Hide the \"delete\" button in the notification tab
Attach an image when sharing a URL

The channel is required when the playlist is public.

This instance works with invitations. Your account will need to be manually approved by an administrator before being usable.

Your username will be unique on %1$s
You will be sent a confirmation e-mail
Password should contain at least 8 characters
Username should only contain letters, numbers and underscores

Your account has been created!

 Think to validate your email within the 48 next hours.

 You can now connect your account by writing %1$s in the first field and click on Connect.

 Important: If your instance required validation, you will receive an email once it is validated!
The application failed to access the admin features. You might need to reconnect the account for having the correct scope.
The account is no longer silenced!
The account is no longer suspended!
The account is no longer disabled!
Display the admin feature in statuses
The application needs to access audio recording
The account you are replying might not see your message!
If disabled, the app will always load last statuses
If disabled, sensitive media will be hidden with a button
Store media in full size with a long press on previews
Add an ellipse button at the top right for listing all tags/instances/lists
During the time slot, the app will send notifications. You can reverse (ie: silent) this time slot with the right spinner.
Display a Fedilab button below profile picture. It is a shortcut for accessing in-app features.
Allow to reply directly in timelines below statuses
Previews will not be cropped in timelines
Allow to play embedded videos directly in timelines
Allow to reverse the way to read statuses that are displayed once tapping the fetch more button
This option allows to support recent cipher suites. It is useful for older Android devices or if you cannot connect to your instance.
Exclusively for Peertube videos. Switch this mode if you cannot play them.
These tags will allow to filter statuses from profiles. You will have to use the context menu for seeing them.
Automatically insert a line break after the mention to capitalize the first letter
Allow content creators to share statuses to their RSS feeds
Maximum retry times when uploading media
Please enter a valid folder name
This folder already exists.\n Please provide another name for the folder
Display a toast message after an action has been completed (boost, fav, etc.)?
If enabled, a crash report will be created locally and then you will be able to share it.
You can send me by email the crash report. It will help to fix it :)\n\nYou can add additional content. Thank you!
When enabled, you will be able to format your text easily with tools.
The application collects your local data, please wait…
This option is per account. It will launch a service that will automatically store your statuses locally in the database. That allows to get statistics and charts
This option is per account. It will launch a service that will automatically store your notifications locally in the database. That allows to get statistics and charts

F-Droid: %2$s
Google: %3$s

Then open the link below with Fedilab and create your account :)

%4$s

Replace Wikipedia link with an open source alternative front-end focused on privacy.

Notifications will be fetched every 15 minutes.
